channel.title: CVE Feed for ovirt -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ovirt -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-10139|2024-08-04T22:10:10.077Z -- ovirt -- cockpit-ovirt
item.description: During HE deployment via cockpit-ovirt, cockpit-ovirt generates an ansible variable file `/var/lib/ovirt-hosted-engine-setup/cockpit/ansibleVarFileXXXXXX.var` which contains the admin and the appliance passwords as plain-text. At the of the deployment procedure, these files are deleted.
